translations: 圣俸；有俸圣职；僧侣之禄

sentences.sentence: The church instituted the young man into a benefice.
sentences.translation: 教会任命这个年轻人任圣职。

sentences.sentence: The quality of service of the call centers affects directly the benefice of a company.
sentences.translation: 呼叫中心的服务质量直接关系到企业形象和经济效益。

sentences.sentence: This kind of condition caused the East Asian country to be at the disadvantageous position in the international competition, so loses great free trade benefice.
sentences.translation: 这种状况使东亚国家在国际竞争中处于不利的地位而失去了巨大的、本来是有可能获得的自由贸易实惠。
